title: Macbook AIR 2013 a1466 FUCK!
message: So i spent half a day fixing this board and boom fan spin cpu heating up!!! YAY!!!!! !!! Reassemble no video... tryed a new lcd and boom perfect video... My question here is how do i tell this lovely amazing customer that she needs a new 250$ LCD and board repair...?$300 my rate.. ?

title: Macbook AIR 2013 a1466 FUCK!
message: Why not check if it is just the LCD cable? I'd say it's a write off with LCD and board. If she does not want to pay swap the board with a parts board.

title: Macbook AIR 2013 a1466 FUCK!
message: Sounds good duke.. Was not aware you could swap the sables on these without destroying the lcd?

title: Macbook AIR 2013 a1466 FUCK!
message: It depends on how careful you are when removing the screen bezel. ;)

title: Macbook AIR 2013 a1466 FUCK!
message: If there is no visible damage to the connector chances will be small though.
